ygData.subject: Re: Invisibility spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Didn t for me either. I would have liked that. Died again in Blackburrow yesterday because the invisibility suddendly vanished in front of a Gnoll Elite,
ygData.messageBody:
According to Joe Wallace:
> Did they just post what was going to be changed without actually changing it? I noticed that they decided to make the invisibility spell icon blink before it wears off, a change I am quite happy about. Unfortunately, it doesn't work. At least, not for me. Did they patch this or not?

Didn't for me either. I would have liked that. Died again in Blackburrow
yesterday because the invisibility suddendly vanished in front of a Gnoll
Elite, which promptly enlisted two passing Gnoll Guardsmen into dispatching
that pesky half-elf...

--
